data.title: 以 3 到 5 分钟描写以下主题
data.content: What are some traits that are important for successful business owners? Why do you think these traits would help them be successful? How do you think having these traits would improve your life?
data.answer: From my perspective, the most important trait for successful business owners is creativity, which is the start point of their entrepreneurship. For the operation of the business, they need to be willing to take risks in this challenging business world. Moreover, entrepreneurs cannot only focus on the current situation, but they should also be future-oriented. By analyzing the market trend and business characters, they can find the opportunity and expand their business. All these traits are also necessary for my life improvement since my whole life can be compared to a business that needs to be operated. When facing competitions, willing to take risks can help me to transfer risks into opportunities. (112字)
